params.catalysts: array of catalysts to be added
params.gems: array of gems to be added

params.amounts: list of amounts of units to burn
params.catalystIds: list of catalysts to burn catalyst units from each
params.from: address of the beneficiary to burn on behalf of

params.amounts: list of amounts of units to burn
params.from: address of the beneficiary to burn on behalf of
params.gemIds: list of gems to burn gem units from each

params.amount: The number of catalyst tokens to burn.
params.catalystId: The id of the catalyst to burn.
params.from: The signing address for the tx.

params.catalystIds: list of catalysts to burn one catalyst from each
params.from: address of the beneficiary to burn on behalf of
address of the beneficiary to burn on behalf of
params.gemIds: list of gems to burn one gem from each

params.amount: The number of gem tokens to burn.
params.from: The signing address for the tx.
params.gemId: The id of the gem to burn.

params.newAdmin: The address of the new administrator.

getAdmin().details: Get the current administrator of this contract.

returns._0: The current administrator of this contract.

params.events: An array of GemEvents. Be aware that only gemEvents from the last CatalystApplied event onwards should be used to populate a query. If gemEvents from multiple CatalystApplied events are included the output values will be incorrect.

returns.values: An array of values for each gem present in the asset.

returns._0: whether the address has superOperator rights.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.enabled: set whether the superOperator is enabled or disabled.
params.superOperator: address that will be given/removed superOperator right.

setTrustedForwarder(address).details: Change the address of the trusted forwarder for meta-TX

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addGemsAndCatalysts(address[],address[]).notice: Adds both arrays of gems and catalysts to registry

batchBurnCatalysts(address,uint16[],uint.notice: Burns few catalyst units from each catalyst id on behalf of a beneficiary

batchBurnGems(address,uint16[],uint256[].notice: Burns few gem units from each gem id on behalf of a beneficiary

burnDifferentCatalysts(address,uint16[],.notice: Burns one catalyst unit from each catalyst id on behalf of a beneficiary

burnDifferentGems(address,uint16[],uint2.notice: Burns one gem unit from each gem id on behalf of a beneficiary

doesCatalystExist(uint16).notice: Query whether a giving catalyst exists.

doesGemExist(uint16).notice: Query whether a given gem exists.

getAttributes(uint16,uint256,(uint16[],b.notice: Returns the values for each gem included in a given asset.

getMaxGems(uint16).notice: Returns the maximum number of gems for a given catalyst

isSuperOperator(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given superOperator rights.

setSuperOperator(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable the ability of `superOperator` to transfer tokens of all (superOperator rights).

userdoc.notice: Contract managing the Gems and Catalysts Each Gems and Catalyst must be registered here. Each new Gem get assigned a new id (starting at 1) Each new Catalyst get assigned a new id (starting at 1)
